examples: We met the new captain while we were taking enemy fire and were unable to observe the niceties of formal introductions.

definitions.definition: Subtlety or precision of use; exactness; preciseness.
examples: A rocket-propelled grenade doesn't have the nicety of a sniper round, but you must admit its effectiveness.

definitions.definition: Delicacy of character or feeling usually from excessive refinement; fastidiousness
That which is delicate to the taste.

secondary_definitions: Subtlety or precision of use; exactness; preciseness.
Delicacy of character or feeling usually from excessive refinement; fastidiousness
( obsolete ) That which is delicate to the taste.
